Detailed Description

This class is a model for hierarchical items that can be represented with a path.

Paths are represented as a '/' separated list. An example path would be "some/sample/path"

See also:
DzHierarchyPath

Parameters:
index The model index to get the row count from
Returns:
The number of items in index. If index is not valid or is the root index for the model, then this method returns the number of children of the root item
